emails.subject: Re: Brett Myers My daughter's Bat Mitzvah
emails.draft:
Hey Brett,

Thanks for reaching out about your daughter's Bat Mitzvah!  I've put together a quote for you here: KANDE QUOTE
It includes options for your celebration.  The quote is dynamic and will adjust pricing based on the items you add to it.

Bat Mitzvahs are always so much fun — our photo booths are a huge hit with the kids and adults alike.  We can customize the overlay with your daughter's name and event details.

Let me know if you have any questions?

message: Email sync requires the local agent (gog CLI). Emails can be pushed manually via POST /api/inbox/refresh.
